Title: Series: Thesaurus Novi Testamenti elegantissimis iconibus expressus continens historias atque miracula do[mi] ni nostri Iesu Christi
Description: The flight into Egypt. The Virgin seen riding a donkey side-saddle with the infant Christ in her lap; Joseph leading the way on foot, his hand resting on the neck of the donkey; a small golden statue seen on a tree, to right (the sun?); in the background, to left, men harvesting and Herod's soldiers in horseback. Engraving with contemporary colouring
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (269.II) (Vos)
New Hollstein (Dutch & Flemish) / The New Hollstein: Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts 1450-1700 (248.II) (De Jode Dynasty: Gerard)
